ygData.subject: Re: Tepid Deeds and a question
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure if this will help much, but I was in Permafrost the other day for about 5 hours, and I went home with about 10 different pages... you might want
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure if this will help much, but I was in Permafrost the other day for about 5 hours, and I went home with about 10 different pages... you might want to try there, but watch out for the ice giants :)

Can anyone tell me how willful one has to be to use the staff of writhing? A friend of mine picked one up somewhere north and let me use it for a while, but it wouldnt cast for me at level 21...

Cogg
----- Original Message -----
From: Tim Borelli
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, August 29, 1999 11:59 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Tepid Deeds


i found a bunch of page 9's on aviaks... and page 8 is a faded one that you have to restore... a guildmate foud that, tho, so i dont know where it is...

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 32nd lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 06:15 PM 8/28/99 -0000, you wrote:
>>>>

I got 24 recently... and haven't been able to find Velishoul's Tome pages 8 and 9 on anything. Everywhere I go, I shout for them, and no one ever seems to have them... Anyone know of any mobs that drop these frequently?

Sloop, Fennin Ro
